title: Kserx7
author: Kserx7
content: Ethernity Cloud- confidential computingThe worldâ€™s most secure data protection solutionOur mission is to revolutionize the cloud computing industry by leveraging blockchain technology and developing a decentralized ecosystem that runs regular cloud software as decentralized cloud applications with location agnostic, self-replicating nodes, defined in Ethereum compatible smart contracts.Unlock the full potential of your data with Ethernity Cloudâ€™s confidential computing solutions. Our innovative technology keeps your information secure and accessible, allowing you to focus on what matters most â€” growing your business. Get in touch today to learn more.Maximize your confidential computing capabilities with Ethernity Cloud. Our trustless model, leveraging SGX and TEE technology, ensures secure execution of your applications and data on the blockchain. Enjoy continuous uptime, guaranteed confidentiality, and transparency. Embrace the power of decentralized confidential computing.Project have two tokens : ETNY; ECLD listing soonOver 3800+ nodes working 24/7, location: our big planetMore info: https://ethernity.cloud/https://discord.gg/SqrHfmNVcThttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloud

comments.author: Leila2
comments.body: In this project i have 7 nodes, I believe in the project, team fire!Ethernity CLOUD - https://ethernity.cloud/Run A Node,Join the FutureJoin the future of Web 3.0 and become a node operator on the Ethernity Cloud network. Choose from our pre-configured nodes or configure your own and start earning rewards today. The base stake is the required minimum amount of 1,976 ETNY tokens allocated to your base stake wallet, and it is mandatory for creating an operational node. Base stake rewards are exclusively dedicated to the node operators. The minimum required stake for a fully operational node is 5,000 ETNY. This includes the 1,976 ETNY base stake and the minimum extended stake of 3,024 ETNY. The maximum amount of ETNY that can be staked on each node is 75,000 ETNY, this includes both base and extended stake. For developers:Why Join Ethernity CLOUD's Developer Grants Program?ðŸ”’ ENHANCE SECURITY: Strengthen your dApps with Ethernity CLOUD's security layer.ðŸ”¬ PUT OUR PROTOCOL TO THE TEST: Challenge our tech and perfect decentralized confidential computing.ðŸŒ± SHAPE THE ECOSYSTEM: Innovate, improve, and make a difference.ðŸ’¨ BOOST PERFORMANCE: Fast-track high-performing dApps.ðŸŒŸ Join the Innovation Journey! Apply For Grant: We have allocated 10000000 tokens (1% of our maximum supply) to distribute amongst the selected projects. We will be considering the projects that make the best use case out of our DEPIN ecosystem. Feel free to discover value through innovation, developing the web3 infrastructure space, or add a security layer on something you have already built. Social from project:https://discord.gg/Ab9MKFVfnYhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloudhttps://www.facebook.com/Ethernity.cloud/https://t.me/ethernitycloud

comments.author: Kserx7
comments.body: Ethernals NFTAt Etherneals NFT, we invite you to explore a world of endless possibilities, where you can discover unique digital assets created through the alchemy of mysticism and modern technology. Our NFTs are generated by combining the power of 7 gods, 5 elements, 12 constellations, 23 sigils, and 3 objects, resulting in a truly one-of-a-kind digital asset.Through the alchemical fusion of these elements, you can acquire an NFT with a unique utility within the Ethernity CLOUD ecosystem. Each NFT holds its own special magic, waiting to be unlocked by its owner.9700 Uncommon NFTs each with 1 god Bonus, and 300 Rare NFTs that will have a bonus from both the god and the element. Gods UtilityThe Etherneals NFT Collection draws its power from 7 gods, each offering unique utilities to stakers and operators of the Ethernity Cloud ecosystem. These utilities are granted to those who participate in staking, operation, and validation within the ecosystem. By harnessing the power of the gods, stakers and operators can reap rewards tailored to their specific actions.Experience the full potential of the Ethernity Cloud ecosystem with Etherneals NFTs and unlock the divine utilities granted by the 7 gods. Rewards DistributionEnter the world of Etherneals NFT Collection and discover its Rewards Distribution. Behold the mystical power of staking, operation, and validation, which earn you powerful rewards. Explore the budget for one year of each activity and the total rewards for five years. https://nft.ethernity.cloud/ethernity.cloudhttps://discord.com/invite/W74JcFPGcbhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloud

comments.author: Kserx7
comments.body: Ethernity Cloud Staking Programm!In the Ethernity Cloud ecosystem, we are welcoming both stakers and node operators to our custom staking solution. Take part in our global Web 3.0 decentralized confidential computing ecosystem and maximize gains.In https://staking.ethernity.cloud/ you can put yours ETNY tokens in two staking options: base staking or extended staking.Read more about each option below:Base StakeThe base stake is the required minimum amount of 1,976 ETNY tokens allocated to your base stake wallet, and it is mandatory for creating an operational node. Base stake rewards are exclusively dedicated to the node operators.The base stake may suffer penalties, if the node is off, or malfunctioning. Provisions must be taken to avoid this from happening.If you are a token holder interested in staking, you may allocate your ETNY tokens to node operators, as part of the extended staking process (detailed below).The minimum required stake for a fully operational node is 5,000 ETNY. This includes the 1,976 ETNY base stake and the minimum extended stake of 3,024 ETNY.Extended StakeThe extended stake is the process of allocating your ETNY tokens to operator nodes via our Staking dApp. Token delegation may be performed either on the stakerâ€™s own nodes or to other node operators, within our ecosystem.The extended stake provider and the node operator will enter into an agreement and share staking rewards. The operator reward split will be set by the extended stake provider. Keep in mind that the reward split has to be attractive to the node operators, to ensure that your extended stake allocation is accepted.The maximum amount of ETNY that can be staked on each node is 75,000 ETNY, this includes both base and extended stake.Please note that staking rewards may be received only if the node is fully functional. The extended stake will not suffer any penalties if the node is off or malfunctioning.More information on our socials:ethernity.cloudhttps://discord.gg/TKb9a3zphRhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloudhttps://www.facebook.com/Ethernity.cloud/

comments.author: Leila2
comments.body: Founded in 2018 by a small team of technologists and crypto enthusiasts, Ethernity explores the integration of blockchain with trusted execution environment technologies.Partnerships with high prestige organizations interested in such technologies is what motivates the team to voluntarily contribute some of their spare time to make the decentralization of the cloud a reality.Ethernity Cloud is building a global ecosystem of computer nodes powered by Intel SGX for WEB 3.0 decentralized confidential computing.To support the rapid expansion of the Ethernity CLOUD ecosystem, we developed our Hardware Affiliate Program (HAP).In the Ethernity CLOUD ecosystem, we partner with companies and individuals that have the capacity to develop and sustain our ecosystem of nodes, following the specs we provide in terms of hardware and software.Hardware Affiliates are businesses that can provide pre-configured nodes to our community. They need to fill out the Registration Form and provide the credentials needed to deliver pre-configured nodes.Node Operators are the individuals that purchase their node(s) from our Hardware Affiliates, set up their account, then connect their node(s) following our specific requirements, in order to be granted their base stake.In the Ethernity CLOUD ecosystem, we are welcoming both stakers and node operators to our custom staking solution. Take part in our global Web 3.0 decentralized confidential computing ecosystem and maximize gains!The base stake is the required minimum amount of 1,976 ETNY tokens allocated to your base stake wallet, and it is mandatory for creating an operational node. Base stake rewards are exclusively dedicated to the node operators. The base stake may suffer penalties, if the node is off, or malfunctioning. Provisions must be taken to avoid this from happening. If you are a token holder interested in staking, you may allocate your ETNY tokens to node operators, as part of the extended staking process (detailed below). The minimum required stake for a fully operational node is 5,000 ETNY. This includes the 1,976 ETNY base stake and the minimum extended stake of 3,024 ETNY.The extended stake is the process of allocating your ETNY tokens to operator nodes via our Staking dApp. Token delegation may be performed either on the stakerâ€™s own nodes or to other node operators, within our ecosystem. The extended stake provider and the node operator will enter into an agreement and share staking rewards. The operator reward split will be set by the extended stake provider. Keep in mind that the reward split has to be attractive to the node operators, to ensure that your extended stake allocation is accepted. The maximum amount of ETNY that can be staked on each node is 75,000 ETNY, this includes both base and extended stake. Please note that staking rewards may be received only if the node is fully functional. The extended stake will not suffer any penalties if the node is off or malfunctioning.https://ethernity.cloud/https://discord.gg/3qBXFvJuUuhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloudhttps://t.me/ethernitycloud

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Swapping verification is taking so long, I have been doing it for over a week and have not yet received confirmation. How long does it take for a verification to be completed?Â  The vesting period is also a concern. How long is it? What are the numbers of blockchains that the project will be moving into.

comments.author: Kserx7
comments.body: ETNY or ECLD ?In the my favorite project in crypto â€” Ethernity CLoud, are two tokens ETNY and ECLD. I want HoDL tokens, but there is one dilemma which token to hold, which token is expensive?ETNY token:can`t buy and sell;obtained through rewards for tasks and staking;needed to run nodes;cannot be sold, can exchange to ECLD 1:1;can be staked.ECLD token:can buy and sell on the exchange;can`t swap other side to ETNY;can`t stake;can pay for services for the projects.More for project:ethernity.cloudhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloudhttps://discord.com/invite/W74JcFPGcbnft.ethernity.cloud

comments.author: Kserx7
comments.body: Briefly about how things are going in Ethernity Cloud now. In the process of all actions in creating our cloud, the team adhered to the roadmap and at the end of this year came with a new token (under the ticker ECLD) to the exchange. The listing was not good or bad, I would say it was tolerable, many expected some unimaginable numbers right away, but the fundamentals donâ€™t work that way. In the process, weak hands lost the token below the public sale price, strong hands hold on and will be rewarded for this on this bull market.So, in principle, we are already growing 4150+ nodes, we are waiting for applied tasks on the nodes, bonus goodies from NFTs, listings on new exchanges at the beginning of next year.We are growing, we are growing, the team is not giving up, the community is growing stronger...By the way...There is an option to earn an ETNY token, the event is taking place in ZeaLY until January 1, 2024, 83k tokens are being drawn among the top 100 (quests are easier than a steamed turnip)https://zealy.io/c/ethernitycloud/invite/WpCXgUrKYvHNmPCXipI2lMore info:ethernity.cloudhttps://discord.gg/gzfubAvRjuhttps://twitter.com/Ethernity_cloud
